meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to make; to produce; to manufacture; to build; to construct 造る usu. for large-scale building, manufacturing, etc.; 創る usu. for creatingどこへ行っても、彼は必ず友達を作る。Wherever he may go, he is sure to make friends.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to prepare (food); to brew (alcohol) たまごを割らずにオムレツは作れない。You can't make an omelet without breaking eggs.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to raise; to grow; to cultivate; to train See also 野菜を作るあなたの菜園で作れる穀物や野菜を食べて生活する方がずっと安上がりだ。It's much cheaper to live on grains and vegetables you can grow in your garden.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to till

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to draw up (a document); to make out; to prepare; to write 文法的に正しい文章を作るよう心がけるべきだ。You should try to produce grammatical sentences.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 6. to create (an artistic work, etc.); to compose ＤＴＰで本を作れば、安いし早いし、まさに一挙両得だ。Desktop publishing lets you produce books quickly and cheaply. It's like killing two birds with one stone.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 7. to coin (a phrase); to organize; to organise; to establish; to found

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 8. to have (a child)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 9. to make up (one's face, etc.)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 10. to fabricate (an excuse, etc.)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 11. to give a (false) appearance; to feign (a smile, etc.); to put on a show of emotion

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 12. to form (a line, etc.) 例外は作るべきではないと思います。I insist that exceptions not be made.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 13. to set (a record)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 14. to commit (a sin, etc.)
造る 【つくる】、創る 【つくる】

You can't make an omelet without breaking eggs.
It's much cheaper to live on grains and vegetables you can grow in your garden.
You should try to produce grammatical sentences.
Desktop publishing lets you produce books quickly and cheaply. It's like killing two birds with one stone.
I insist that exceptions not be made.

1. operation; management; handling このコンピューターの操作は難しい。Operating this computer is tricky.
2. manipulating (to one's benefit); manipulation; influencing 私はこのＣＤプレイヤーの操作のしかたが分からない。I don't know how to operate this CD player.

sentences.translation: Operating this computer is tricky.
I don't know how to operate this CD player.

meanings.meaning: 1. movement (of the body); action; motion; gesture 彼は動作がぎこちない。He is awkward in his movements.
2. bearing; carriage; behaviour; behavior; demeanour; demeanor
3. operation (of a machine, software, etc.); running; working; functioning 福祉予算を犠牲にして打ち上げられた人工衛星は、正常に動作しなかった。The artificial satellite launched at the cost of the welfare budget did not work properly.

sentences.translation: He is awkward in his movements.
The artificial satellite launched at the cost of the welfare budget did not work properly.

meanings.meaning: 1. masterpiece; masterwork; chef d'oeuvre; fine piece of work その偉大な画家の傑作が壁にさかさまにかかっているを見て、彼は驚いた。He was surprised to find the great artist's masterpiece hung on the wall upside down.
2. (unintentionally) hilarious; absurd (e.g. blunder); outrageous; wild Jocular, humorous term, Dated termわははは！そりゃ傑作だ！A-ha-ha-ha! What a blunder!

sentences.translation: He was surprised to find the great artist's masterpiece hung on the wall upside down.
A-ha-ha-ha! What a blunder!

meanings.meaning: 1. creation; production; creative work (novel, film, etc.); original work; (creative) writing この画家は美しい絵画を創作する。This artist creates beautiful paintings.
2. fabrication; fiction; invention それは彼女の創作だろう。I think she made up that story.

sentences.translation: This artist creates beautiful paintings.
I think she made up that story.

meanings.meaning: 1. work (film, book) 彼の次の制作は非常に意欲的なミュージカルだった。His next production was a very ambitious musical.
2. production; creation; turning (something) out; development

sentences.translation: His next production was a very ambitious musical.
